Lucena has been in this for four years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Lucena would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Cherimy

texts.en:
As a married parent of one child, Cherimy works hard to support her family.

She has a charcoal making business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fish vending. Cherimy is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy coconut shells to use for her charcoal making business.

Cherimy has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy coconut shells to use in her business

loans.name: María Elvia

texts.es:
María de 48 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado, tiene 2 hijos pero no viven con ella, actualmente se encuentra acompañada y su pareja trabaja como motorista y nadie vive con ellos. 

María trabaja en la venta de productos lácteos, venta que realiza de casa en casa en la colonia pero también realiza las ventas en su hogar, tiene un año y medio de realizar esta labor, ella decidió dedicarse a esto al ver la necesidad que existía en la zona por lo cual le ha dado buenos resultados.   
          

Ella necesita este crédito para comprar productos como frijoles, arroz, azúcar, aceite y huevos ya que su negocio ha crecido y se ve en la necesidad de tener más variedad de productos para sus clientes.

Su sueño principal es seguir creciendo en el negocio, abrir otro puesto para la venta de lácteos y así poder cubrir sus compromisos crediticios.
texts.en:
Maria is 48 years old, with a sixth grade education. She has 2 children but they do not live with her. She currently has a partner. Her partner is a driver, and no one lives with them.

Maria works selling dairy products door to door in the neighborhood, but she also makes sales from her home. She has been doing this work for a year and a half. She decided to do this after seeing the need for it in the area, and she has seen good results.

She needs this loan to buy products such as beans, rice, sugar, oil and eggs, since her business has grown and she sees the need for a greater variety of products to offer to her customers. 

Her biggest dream is to keep growing her business and to open another stand to sell dairy products so that she can meet her loan obligations.

loans.use: to buy products such as beans, rice, sugar, oil and eggs, since her business has grown and she needs a greater variety of products.

loans.name: Parhoi Sornu Lom Group

texts.en:
Domlam, pictured with her hand raised, is the profiled borrower of the group. She is 51 years old and a mother to two sons and a daughter. She and her family live in a village located about 25 kilometres from Imphal town. Her husband is a postman and spends most of his time delivering letters in different villages. 

She has been doing a weaving business for the past seven years. She weaves traditional shawls and wraparound skirts to sell for income generation purposes. In addition to weaving, she makes charcoal during the winter season and sells it for profit. She also sells vegetables from time to time to meet their family's requirements.

Domlam is a very hard working mother who is committed to providing for her family. Though her eldest son is now married, she is very determined to educating the younger siblings who presently study in the nearby village. She used previous loans from WSDS in weaving which helped her to manage her children’s education fees. After successfully repaying that loan, she is now ready to take on another.

With this Kiva loan, she is planning to buy yarn of good quality to weave expensive wraparound skirts to sell. It takes two weeks to complete one skirt by weaving manually. She also aspires to sell vegetables and charcoal in the mornings at the market for income generation. She hopes to make a good investment. 

She gives her thanks to Kiva. The rest of the group members are engaged in weaving, embroidery, and poultry. They join hands to help one another and call themselves “Parhoi Sornu.”

loans.use: To buy yarn to weave skirts to sell and pay for her children’s education.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: help her son to buy eggs, spices, oil, onions, cauliflower, tomato ketchup, and plastic furniture.

loans.name: Chunnu Lom Group

texts.en:
40 years old Donyang, the lady pictured with her hand raised, is the profiled borrower of the group Chunnu.’ She belongs to one of the tribal groups in Manipur. She lives with her husband and three children in ‘Longa K’ village which lies in the hills. In her village,  people engage in manual farming for their livelihood and Donyang’s family is one among them. Her husband is a farmer who provides his family from his farming. 

Donyang is a gifted and talented weaver. She uses her skills to support her family by weaving traditional shawls (local name ‘Saipikhup’ and ‘Thangnang’) and wraparound skirts (local name ‘Khamtang’) for sale. In Manipur, wraparound skirts are commonly worn by womenfolk at all times and shawls are worn during winter by both men and women to beat the cold. She has been in weaving business for the past 20 years. She sells her weaving product at home and most customers come to her house to buy the products. It takes at least two weeks to complete one wraparound skirt and one week for a shawl.

 Donyang has previously received a loan  from Kiva and WSDS. It helped her improve her financial condition. She is very glad that she is now able to support herself and her children, but still strives to give them  the best she can. 
 
She wishes to buy a stock of silk yarn and threads for her weaving. With the loan she will buy varieties of colourful silk yarn to make beautiful shawls and wraparound skirts to attract customers. The income will provide for her children’s education cost and other basic needs. She thanks WSDS for their support and the rest of the group members are very happy and excited to get a loan. They are engaged in weaving, poultry, piggery, shopkeeper, clothing sales, and selling rice.

loans.use: To buy colourful silk yarn to use in weaving skirts to sell and pay for the basic needs of her family.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a variety of clothing to resell

loans.name: Rahbar

texts.en: Rahbar is a gentle woman. She was born and grew up in remote district. She is married and has four children. Her husband is a service master. Rahbar is thrifty, hospitable and a nice mother and wife. She has a business buying and selling women’s clothes in her permanent place in a domestic market. Rahbar is satisfied from this activity. She has gained a great experience during thirteen years. She knows how to serve clients, in order they come again to her store. Rahbar has requested 7,500 TJS loan to buy women’s clothes. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy women's clothes.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy is 40 years old and married with five children in school. She works very hard to provide for them. Daisy runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase item to sell like canned goods, beverages, biscuits, condiments, etc.

Daisy has been in this business for five years now.  She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses. In the future, Daisy would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase item to sell like canned goods, beverages, biscuits, condiments, etc.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is 60 years old and married with four children. For the past year, she has run a general store in the Philippines where she sells a variety of items such as shampoo, soap, biscuits, candies, junk food, and other items. Virginia works very hard to provide for her family.

Virginia is requesting a 7,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as eggs, canned goods, cigarettes, shampoo, groceries, and other products. In the future, she would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy eggs, canned goods, cigarettes, shampoo, groceries and other products

loans.name: Farouk

texts.en:
Farouk is a 36-year-old, married man and a father of four children, who lives with his family in a rented house in Sana'a city, Yemen. Farouk has struggled, and is a man who works hard to guarantee a better future for his family. He started working as a worker in a traditional restaurant with a small salary. He found the work with other as a difficulty for him and decided to start his own business. In time, he opened a small and traditional restaurant for himself, and he had employed a small number of workers in it with a monthly salary. 

In truth, his capital is still very low and that negatively affects his income. For this reason, he applied to Al- Amal Microfinance Bank and asked for a loan of 200,000 YER to purchase many different food materials for his restaurant. Farouk hopes to buy a piece of land and build his own house on it. He also hopes to open another restaurant besides the first one.

loans.use: to purchase many different food materials for his restaurant.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new solar system for heating water and a tank.

loans.name: Wisaam

texts.en:
Wisaam is a 30-year-old, married man from Deir El Balah city. He lives with his wife and one daughter in a small house. Wisam works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. He wants to improve the family’s living conditions and buy all the necessities.

Wisaam took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new solar system for heating water and a water purification machine. By taking this loan, Wisaam will be able to provide hot water for the house without using electricity and also clean water. Wisaam appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new solar system for heating water and a water purification machine.

loans.name: Emelda

texts.en:
As a married parent of seven children, Emelda works hard to support her family. She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fish vending. Emelda is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy fish nets and other materials needed for her fishing business.

Emelda has been sustaining her business activities through her past five loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fish nets and other materials needed for her business.

loans.name: Cherono

texts.en:
Despite the importance of agriculture to Kenya and its economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Kenya remain underserved by financial institutions. Juhudi Kilimo is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Kenyan farmers.

Meet Cherono, an ambitious woman who always seeks her horizon. Since she was little, she showed a strong passion for independent work, but when she became pregnant, she left behind many of her dreams to focus completely on taking care of her little ones.

Since her children are at a good age, she wants to take up her dreams again and create work to maintain herself, since she doesn't know when her husband might be lacking or when they would go through a very complicated situation. Her primary source of income has come from selling milk, crop farming, and poultry farming. Through these ventures, she has been able to earn a decent income. She is a very determined and dedicated farmer who has been farming for ten years, and throughout she has never regretted going into farming.

Although this humble mum has been making profits, not everything has been “a bed of roses." She faces financial challenges, and because the Kericho area has proven a ready market for cereals, she is kindly seeking a loan to buy cereals for resale and thus improve her income.

Cherono's upbringing was challenging, and she has faced many economic problems. Still, this ever-smiling mum has been making great improvements, and she believes that through your loan she will be able to realize her goal of improving her living conditions and transforming her life.

Through Juhudi Kilimo, Cherono has received training and proven to be honest and disciplined with finances. She intends to fully repay the loan with the profits from her business. Cherono is quite a visionary and, with her accumulated profits, she hopes she will be able to open a large cereal-selling shop that will boost her income and turn her life around.

loans.use: to buy cereals for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new paintbrushes, rollers, and kerosene oil for her son's business.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
El Sr. Pedro vive en la ciudad de Paraguarí, tiene 31 años, es pintor, y trabaja por la capital del país, es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora.
El siempre lucha para poder dar a sus seres queridos todo lo que necesitan para una vida digna y sin privaciones. Pide este préstamo para poder refaccionar a su casa, y de esa forma poder darle un techo digno a su familia.
texts.en:
Sr. Pedro lives in the city of Paraguarí. He is 31 years old and works as a painter in the capital of Paraguay. Pedro is a hardworking and determined person.

He always strives to provide his loved ones with everything they need so that they can have a decent life without deprivation. Pedro is requesting this loan so that he can repair his house. This will allow him to provide his family a decent roof over their heads.

loans.use: to make repairs to his house.

loans.name: Tito Roberth

texts.es:
Tito tiene 30 años de edad, es soltero, vive en casa propia en el distrito de Pomahuaca que se encuentra en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Sus actividades principales son la agricultura y ganadería, es un caserío pequeño con aspiraciones a superarse.

El se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con cultivos de café en buen estado, además se dedica al cultivo de maíz, yuca, etc. y se desempeña como peón agrícola en la zona realizando trabajos de cultivo de café y otros, cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. El destino del crédito será para invertir en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café y así poder incrementar su nivel de ventas lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Tito is 30 years old and single. He lives in his own home in the District of Pomahuaca in Jaén Province, which is located in the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru. The business activities in the area are agriculture and livestock breeding. This small village has aspirations for success.

Tito works in agriculture and has coffee crops that are in good condition. In addition, he grows corn, cassava, and other crops. He also works a farm laborer in an area known for cultivating coffee and other crops. Tito has very good personal and work-related references who are from his district. This loan will be invested in the purchase of compost and fertilizers so that he can maintain his coffee crop. As a result, he will be able to increase his sales levels, which will allow him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers so that he can maintain his coffee crop.

loans.name: Reyna Elizabeth

texts.es:
Reyna tiene 38 años de edad,  estudio hasta sexto grado, actualmente esta acompañada y tiene 4  hijos  los cuales estudian en la escuela, su pareja trabaja en la agricultura y ademas es militar, y solo sus 4 hijos dependen de Reyna. 


Reyna se dedica a vender ropa en los cantones, yendo de casa en casa cargando la mercadería, tiene muchos años de dedicarse a esta actividad, decidió independizarse y poner su propio negocio, ella se desplaza de cantón en cantón a pie, en fines de semana se involucra su hijo mayor  y el horario es de 7:00 am  a 4:00 pm.

Ella necesita este crédito para comprar faldas ,pantalones, ropa interior  y camisas para salir a vender a los cantones.

A futuro ella sueña con ampliar el negocio  y hacer mas grande su casa  para vivir cómodos con su familia.
texts.en:
Reyna is 38 years old.  She went to school up to grade six.  She is in a relationship and has 4 children who are in school.  Her partner works in agriculture and is also in the military.  Only Reyna's 4 children depend upon her.

Reyna works at selling clothing in the rural communities, going from house to house carrying her merchandise.  She has worked at this for many years.  She decided to become independent and to set up her own business.  She moves from community to community on foot.  On the weekends she involves her oldest son.  She works from 7:00AM until 4:00 PM.

She needs this loan in order to buy skirts, pants, underwear, and shirts to sell in the rural communities.

In the future her dream is to extend her business and to make her house bigger in order to live there more comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to buy skirts, pants, underwear and shirts to sell in the rural communities

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bulbs to sell and for making decoration lights.

loans.name: Flores De Chacaltaya Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FLORES DE CHACALTAYA” iniciará el décimo octavo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Alto Lima, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Paola es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de cosméticos, venta de ropa, venta de mantas, venta de comida, tienda de barrio, venta de carne, librería. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Paola es integrante, ella indica que hace diez años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una vecina que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de cosméticos; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio hace varios años, con el apoyo de su madre quien trabaja con el mismo negocio y le otorgó un porcentaje de su mercadería. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de cosméticos por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo venderá a solicitud de la cliente. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los ahorros que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The A.C. "Flores de Chacaltaya" (Flowers of Chacaltaya) will begin its eighteenth cycle in Pro Mujer (Pro Women), as part of Centro Focal de Alto Lima.  It is made of eight members, and it is headed by a board where Señora Paola is the secretary.  The businesses that the members of the communal association have are varied.  Among them are: selling cosmetics, selling clothing, selling blankets, selling food, neighborhood store, selling meat, book store.

The loan that they took out with benefit the small micro-entrepreneurs where Señora Paola is a member.  She says that ten years ago she joined Pro Mujer, joining by the invitation of a neighbor who is a member of the institution.  Today she has a business selling cosmetics.  One should know that she started this business a few years ago with the support of her mother, who works in the same business and gave her a percentage of the merchandise.

The loan that she will take out now is to increase capital (to buy cosmetics wholesale) that she will acquire from wholesale venders in the city of El Alto, and later she will sell it at the request of the customer.  This job allows her to generate resources to support her family economically, since she is single and has a son.

When asked about what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the saving that institution offers.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics wholesale.

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es:
Gabriel es un hombre de 33 años de edad, divorciado, tiene 2 hijos de 2 y 4 años, y su negocio es la confección de ponchos.
Él es buen padre, independiente, paciente, constante, responsable y trabajador. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ’16 de julio’ un área estratégica porque tiene un alto flujo comercial; es una vitrina de la producción de la pequeña y mediana empresa, la zona es una muestra del panorama típico comercial e industrial de esa ciudad, de clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre  0-16 grados centígrados y se encuentra a una altitud de 4070 metros sobre el nivel del mar.
Gabriel es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, ojos obscuros, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con sus hijos que aún no se encuentran en edad escolar, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la confección de ponchos, actividad que viene realizando desde muy joven porque su familia se dedica a la misma labor. “Mujeres de pollera, de vestido, caballeros, jóvenes y niños, caminan deambulando de un lugar para otro,  a muy tempranas horas de la mañana, ya que a partir de la 4 y 5 de la  mañana la gente ya prepara su mercadería para ofertarlo a sus visitantes…” comenta. Su sueño es ampliar su taller de costura y diversificar sus productos, él desea realizar la compra de cortes de tela por mayor para elaborar ponchos y venderlos en una ciudad vecina. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 6 años que realiza esta actividad de manera independiente. 
Es por esos motivos que Gabriel solicita un préstamo para la compra de cortes de tela por mayor para confeccionar ponchos y venderlos en otra ciudad
texts.en:
Gabriel is a 33 year old man.  He is divorced and has two children, aged 2 and 4.  His business is making ponchos.

He is a good father, independent, patient, consistent, responsible, and hardworking.  His business is in the zone "16 de Julio," a strategic area because it has a high flow of trade.  It is a showcase of production for small and midsized businesses.  The area is a panorama show of typical commerce and industry of that city.

The climate is cold and dry with a temperature that varies during the day between 0º-16º C (32º-60ºF).  It is found at an altituf of 4070 meters (13,353 feet) above sea level.  Gabriel is dark skinned, has short black hair, is short in stature, has dark eyes, and is thin.  His mother tongue is Aymará what is spoken in the area, and he speaks Spanish in culture and for the trading that he does.  He shares his live with his sons that are not yet of school age.  They live in their own home made of brick that has potable water, electricity, gas, and plumbing.  

His business is in making ponchos, a job that he has been doing since he was very young because his family works in the same trade.  "Women, dressed, men, youth, and children, they walk wandering about from one place to another, in the early hours of the morning, starting from 4 and 5 in the morning, the people are already preparing their merchandise to offer to their visitors," he says.  

His dreams is to increase his workshop and to diversify his products. He wants to buy fabric wholesale to make ponchos and sale them in a neighboring city.  This is the first sequence of loans with the institution in the six years that he has been doing this job independently.  

It is for those reasons that Gabriel is requesting a loan to buy fabric wholesale to make ponchos and sell them in another city.

loans.use: To buy fabric wholesale to make ponchos and sell them in another city.

loans.name: Ira

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of Ruma’s agents, Ira. Ira lives in Bogor, a suburban area located about an hour from Jakarta. Ira is a factory worker who runs a small stall that provides mobile payment services for her community. This is the third time she is asking for a loan from Kiva. The previous loan helped her to expand her business, and she thanks all of the lenders because of it.

As the business grows, Ira is hoping to get another working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to provide more mobile payment services to her community, especially on weekends. Having known about the importance, Ira will find your loan very useful to help her improve her business and accordingly, her community, which needs access to such services.

As seen in the photo, Ira is the one who is standing. She will be thankful for your kind and endless support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile payment services for her community.

loans.name: Dúo Cantares Group

texts.es:
DUO CANTARES
LA señora Zoila es una personas muy trabajadora que le gusta el negocio ella se dedica al negocio a la venta de ropa, trastos de cocina , zapatos , y medicina natural  día tras día lucha para salir adelante  anterior mente ella ha trabajado con Fape es el segundo crédito que ella solicita ya qué gracias a Dios logro  incrementar sus ventas y ahora quiere  hacer lo mismo así poco a poco lograra realizar lo que ella se ha propuesto, que es sacar delantes a su familia, esta solicitando este credito para la compra de trastos de cocina,zapatos,medicina natural y venta de ropa para vender.
texts.en:
Duo Cantares

Zoila is a very hardworking person that like business.  She makes a living in the business of selling clothing, kitchen utensils, shoes, and natural medicine.  Day after day she strives to get ahead.  Previously, she has worked with Fape.  

It is the second loan that she is requesting.  Since, thanks to God, she continues to increase her sales, and now she wants to do the same.  Little by little she will be able to do what she set out to do, which is get her family ahead.

She is requesting this loan to buy kitchen utensils, shoes, natural medicine, and clothing to sell.

loans.use: To buy kitchen utensils, shoes, natural medicine, and clothing to sell.

loans.name: Mfariji Group

texts.fr: La cliente Cikwanine est présidente du groupe Mfariji et vendeuse de friperie depuis 1998 grâce au fonds de démarrage reçu de son mari à l’âge de 48 ans. Mère de 7 enfants tous allant à l’école, elle sollicite un nouveau crédit qui lui servira d’acheter 40 paires de tricots. Son rêve est de renforcer son système d’épargne et agrandir son entreprise. A cet effet, elle remercie HEKIMA pour son soutien.
texts.en: Our client Cikwanine is the leader of the Mfarijo group. She has been selling used clothing since 1998 thanks to the starting capital received from her husband at the age of 48 years. She has seven children, all of whom are in school. She is seeking a new loan which will allow her to buy 40 sets of knit shirts. Her goal is to bolster her savings and expand her business. With this in mind, she thanks Hekima for its support.

loans.use: to buy 40 pairs of knit shirts.

loans.name: Vanessa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Vanessa, de 24 años de edad, está soltera, se levanta muy temprano en la mañana para ir a abrir su puesto de trabajo en el mercado.

Vanessa, se dedica al comercio de ropa interior femenina y es muy conocida en su ciudad por su amabilidad y buena atención hacia sus clientes. 

El crédito que está solicitando es para comprar ropa interior femenina para vender.

Ella es una mujer emprendedora, con deseos de superación.- Su sueño es, lograr que su negocio crezca.
texts.en:
Vanessa, who is 24 years old, is single. She gets up very early in the morning to go to open the stand in the market where she works.

Vanessa sells women's underwear, and she is well known in her city for her friendliness and her good service to her customers.

The loan that she is applying for is to buy women's underwear to sell.

She is an entrepreneurial woman with the desire to achieve. Her dream is to make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy women's underwear to sell

loans.name: Clara Rosibel

texts.es:
Clara es una joven de 19 años de edad, ella  cuenta con un nivel académico de bachillerato general, y desempeña la actividad de oficios domésticos, vive junto a su madre, tres hermanos y dos sobrinas que se encuentran estudiando, su familia realiza la actividad de producción de granos básicos como también sus hermanos la actividad de albañilería.    


Clara se dedica a los oficios domésticos, lo hace desde hace muchos años y con lo cual ha apoyado económicamente a su madre, además apoya en las actividades agrícolas que desarrollan los demás miembros de su familia.
  

Clara utilizara el crédito para comprar fertilizantes para la producción de sandía y granos básicos como maíz lo cual le servirá posteriormente para la  producción de tortillas.  

Ella sueöa con salir adelante con su familia, seguir apoyando a su madre y hermanos y en un futuro encontrar mejores oportunidades para desarrollarse como persona.
texts.en:
Clara is a young woman of 19. She has a general high school degree, and she performs domestic tasks. She lives with her mother, three siblings, and two nieces who are in school. The family produces basic grains, and her siblings work in masonry.

Clara does domestic work. She has done it for many years, and with it she has supported her mother economically. In addition, she helps with the agricultural activities of the other members of her family.

Clara will use the loan to buy fertilizers to produce watermelons and basic grains such as corn, which will serve her later for the production of tortillas.

Her dream is to advance with her family, to continue supporting her mother and siblings, and in the future to find better opportunities to develop as a person.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to produce watermelons and basic grains such as corn, which she will use later to make tortillas

loans.name: Asdrubal

texts.es: Asdrubal,, tiene la edad  de 31 años, está soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de un arado de buena calidad y que se ajuste a las necesidades que requiere para mecanizar terreno con un chapulín, con este equipo alistara el terreno para la siembra de caña de azúcar la cual es utilizada en la elaboración de dulce. La idea es aprovechar el espacio que tiene de terreno para hacer una siembra nueva y así aumentar a corto plaza la producción de dulce. También aprovechar las buenas condiciones de terreno, agua potable y clima para poder desarrollar la actividad de este cultivo. Con esta compra podrá fortalecer la actividad, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más ingresos  para invertir más en el cultivo.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Asdrubal is 31 years old. He is single and lives with his parents and siblings, who are his greatest priority. With the loan, he plans to make the purchase of a plow that is of good quality and that adjusts to the requirements that he needs in order to mechanize his land preparation with a tractor. With this equipment he will prepare the land for the planting of sugar cane, which is used in making sugar. The idea is to take advantage of the area of land that he has to make a new planting and thus increase in the short term his production of sugar. He will also take advantage of the good condition of the land, potable water, and climate to be able to develop this crop. With this purchase he will be able to strengthen his business, and at the same time have savings that will allow him to have more income to invest more in his crop. 

This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had other loans in the past from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy a plow to prepare his land mechanically.

loans.name: Gayrat

texts.ru: Гайрат молодой и трудолюбивый парень 27 лет. Он  женат.  Его  жену зовут Фазила. Она домохозяйка.  Со своей семьёй Гайрат живут в сельском посёлке. Для того, чтобы иметь доход на проживание Гайрат занимается своим бизнесом. Вот уже на протяжении 10 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультуру, а также выращивает лук. Затем, когда собирает урожай, вывозит на большой базар и там продаёт свой урожай. Раньше он занимался деканством и потом решил реализовывать свой урожай. Также как дополнительный доход, Гайрат имеет от другого вида бизнеса. У него имеется несколько голов скота, которых он выращивает для дальнейшей продажи. Но сейчас Гайрат хочет расширить бизнес, именно по выращиванию сельхозкультуры. Но сейчас у него недостаточно собственных денежных средств, чтобы закупить семена для посева урожая. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет взять кредит для закупа семян для посева. Гайрат очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Gayrat is a hardworking, married young man of 27. His wife's name is Fazila and she is a homemaker. Gayrat and his family live in a rural village. In order to earn a living, he runs his own farming business. For 10 years he has been growing vegetables and onions. After gathering his harvest, he brings it to the big market and sells it. Previously, he worked on a co-operative farm, and then decided to sell his own harvest. He also has another side of the business to bring in additional income: he has a few head of livestock, which he raises for later resale. 

Gayrat wants to expand his business, specifically by growing more vegetables. But he doesn't have enough of his own money to buy seeds for planting. Therefore he has approached Arvand and wants to take out a loan to buy seeds. He hopes very much for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to purchase seeds

loans.name: Tohir

texts.ru:
Тохир трудолюбивый мужчина 38 лет. Он женат и имеет одного ребенка. Его жену зовут Наргиза. Она домохозяйка. Он пекарь. Он печет лепешки. А также занимается куплей продажей сухофруктов, что приносит дополнительный доход в его семью.
В данное время Тохир вместе со своей женой хотят построить дом, где будут хорошие условия для проживания. Для этого Тохир обратилася в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для построения дома. Он надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Tohir is 38 years old and hardworking.  He is married and the father of a young child.  His wife's name is Nargiza.  Nargiza is a homemaker and Tohir works as a baker.  He also buys and sells dry fruits, which provides an additional source of income for the family.  At the moment, Tohir and his wife are planning to build a house, which will improve their living conditions.  For this reason, Tohir has turned to MDO Arvand and applied for a loan to buy construction materials to build his house.  Tohir is looking forward to a positive outcome and thanks MDO Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Makhsudjon

texts.ru:
Махсудчон проживает в районе Спитамен. Ему 36 лет. Он женат и имеет три дочки. Дети учатся в средней школе. Жена домохозяйка. Махсудчон ответственный человек и чувствует свою ответственность за свою жену и детей и старается создать хорошие условия для житья. На районе почти все сельские жители занимается скотоводством и тоже решил заняться этим видом деятельность. У него есть коровник и корм для скота.
Ему осталось только купить пару голов скота и начать деятельность. Чтобы купить надобное количество скотов Максдчону необходимо получить кредит. По этой причине он обратился за кредитом.
texts.en: Makhsudjon lives in the Spitamen district of Tajikistan.  He is 36 years old, married, and he has three daughters, all enrolled in secondary school.  Makhsudjon's wife is a homemaker.  Makhsudjon himself is a conscientious man who feels very responsible towards his wife and children and who always tries to provide the best for them.  Almost all of the rural residents of the district are involved in animal husbandry, so Makhsudjon has decided to do the same.  He already has a stable and some animal feed.  The only thing he has to buy before he can start his business is a couple of cows.  However, in order to make this purchase, he needs to borrow money.  For this reason, he has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Shohida

texts.ru: Шохида 42 летняя жительница района Спитамен. Она замужем и мать двоих детей. Шохида очень ответственная женщина. Она 5 лет назад начала свой бизнес. Она занимается продажей средств гигиены и разной косметики. Шохида вот уже 5 лет своей жизни продвигает данную деятельность. Она знает все тонкости своей работы. Шохида хочет расширить деятельность и привлечь больше клиентов. Она решила увеличить ассортимент товара. Из-за нехватки денежных средств Шохида обратилась за кредитом. Шохида надеется на получения кредита. Запрашиваемый кредит поможет ей улучшить и расширить деятельность. Поддержите ее стать хорошим бизнес woman.
texts.en: Shohida is a 42-year-old resident of the Spitamen district.  She is married and the mother of two children.  She is very responsible.  She started her own business five years ago, and she now sells sanitary products and various cosmetics.  She has already devoted five years of her life to this activity, so she knows all the details of her business.  She now wants to expand her activity and attract more customers.  For this reason, she has decided to increase her inventory.  However, because of insufficient funds, she had to apply for a loan.  Shohida is looking forward to a positive outcome.  The loan she has applied for will help her to improve and expand her business.  Please help her become a successful businesswoman!

loans.use: to buy a variety of cosmetics in order to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy beans and millet for frying bean cakes.

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.en:
Gulchehra is a very polite, skilled and wise woman. She is 50 years old. She lives with her family in the Rudaki region. Gulchehra is a very good seamstress. She has six years of experience in this activity. She works every day. Her daughter-in-law helps her. 

Now, Gulchehra needs money for buying fabrics, threads and other things for sewing. She wants to expand her business, but unfortunately, she does not have enough finances to do it. That’s why she applied for a loan. She really needs your support.

loans.use: to buy fabrics, threads and other things for sewing.

loans.name: Raziya

texts.ru: Разия, 44 года, замужем, есть сын, ему 22 года. У Разии среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, она занимается животноводством и полеводством уже 26 лет. Благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Разии, на сегодняшний день у нее есть 4 коровы, 6 бычков, 20 овец и 3 лошади. На участке мерою 1,8 Га собственной и 1,0 Га арендованной земли, она выращивает зерновые культуры, эспарцет и картофель для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Разия обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 3 дойных коров для увеличения объемов реализации экологически чистого молока. Разия намерена расширить свой бизнес, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи.
texts.en:
Raziya is 44 years old, married, and has a 220year old son. Raziya has received secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, she has been raising livestock and growing produce for some 26 years. Thanks to Raziya's persistence and hard work, at present she has four cows, six bulls, 20 sheep and three horses. On  her own land plot of 1.8 ha [4.5 acres] and a leased plot of 1.0 ha [2.5 acres], she grows grains, sainfoin [a plant used for animal fodder] and potatoes for own consumption  as well as for sale. 

Raziya has applied to the microfinance institution Bai Tushum for a loan in the amount of 150,000 KGS to buy three dairy cows in order to increase her sales of environmentally clean milk. Raziya intends to expand her business, which certainly will bolster her family's capital.

loans.use: to purchase 3 dairy cows in order to increase the volume of organic milk sales.

loans.name: Siham

texts.en:
Siham is a 48-year-old married woman from a village near Jenin city. She lives with her husband and two sons in a small house. Her husband works as a taxi driver, and he gets a low income. She wants to improve the family's living conditions and buy all the needed stuff.

Siham took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new solar system for heating water. By taking this loan, Siham will be able to provide hot water for the house without using electricity.

Siham appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new solar system for heating water

loans.name: Sally

texts.en:
Sally is a hardworking, friendly, honest and good-hearted mum. She is 54 years old and lives in Kipkaner, a remote village in Kapsowar. She is happily married and is blessed with adorable children. 

She has been practicing mixed farming for the last five years and has gained so much experience. To afford a decent and comfortable life for her children, she has been selling milk, eggs, and a variety of food crops from her farmland. To make ends meet and make extra cash, she has been engaging in another small personal business. 

The Kapsowar area is very populated and demand for poultry products and eggs is very high. Like many farmers from her region, she finds poultry farming very enjoyable, and she stated that the most enjoyable part about poultry farming is “the increased profits I enjoy.” Her biggest challenge, however, is meeting the demand that is really high. 

She lacks funds to increase her poultry farming, and she is seeking a loan of 20,000 KES (Kenyan shillings) to buy poultry. Being a woman, accessing funds is very challenging, but through institutions such as Juhudi Kilimo via Kiva, she feels relieved knowing that her dream will be achieved, and that she will be able to buy more poultry. 

Through the loan, she will sell eggs and poultry products to her neighbors and to the local market, and this will translate to increased profit margins and an improved income level. Being a visionary woman, she intends to accumulate more profits and increase her poultry market to other markets and this will increase her income and improve her living conditions. The extra income she will get will be used in fully repaying back the loan and permanently changing her living conditions and securing the future of her school-going children.

loans.use: to buy poultry

loans.name: Sairagul

texts.ru: Сайрагул 47 лет, замужем, дети взрослые, живут отдельно. В качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, Сайрагул с 1991 года занимается полеводством и животноводством. На участке мерою 2,25 Га выращивает сельскохозяйственные культуры. Бизнес Сайрагул приносит прибыль в размере около 25,000 сом (KGS). На данный момент она планирует отремонтировать дом, поэтому обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS), меньшая часть средств, а именно 45,000 сом (KGS) будет направлена на покупку 10 овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от бизнеса Сайрагул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства и хочет накопить на покупку кошары.
texts.en: Sairagul is 47 years old and married.  Her children are adults and independent.  In order to provide her family with its main source of income, Sairagul has been raising livestock and growing crops (on 2.25 hectares of land) since 1991.  Thanks to her activity, she makes about 25,000 som (KGS) per month.  At the moment, she is planning to renovate her house, and for this reason, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS).  A small part of her loan (45,000 som) will be used to buy ten sheep in order to increase the size of her herd.  Sairagul is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further grow her farming business.  She would also like to save enough money to buy an enclosure for her sheep.

loans.use: to renovate her family's house and to buy 10 sheep in order to invest in her business.

loans.name: Pyapon Taman Village Group 1

texts.en:
This community is located in Pyapon Taman Village, which has a population of over 600, in the Myanmar Ayeyarwaddy Delta region. In this community, five CBO (Community Based Organization) members are overseeing a group of 27 village customers (nine males and 18 females). This loan will support this community in purchasing high-quality feed (duck food and packets of shrimp), which will last one month for a hundred ducks. 

Duck raising has become a main source of income for Pyapon Taman. In addition to duck raising, the village focuses on crop farming and raises other livestock, such as pigs, as a source of savings.

Pictured above are the CBO members from Pyapon Taman Group 1, named Aung, Kyaw, Thin, Than, and Nyunt. Included in the picture, Kyaw (first from right) is 31 years old and married with one child.  Kyaw has 100 ducks and 200 ducklings that he or his wife look after. In addition to duck raising, the family cultivates its crop farm.  

Proximity's loan will help the family purchase high quality feeds for both ducks and ducklings, so that the ducks are better nourished, increasing egg production and enabling the ducklings to grow more quickly, all of which will boost Kyaw's family income.

loans.use: to purchase high quality feed

loans.name: Zulfikuor

texts.ru: Зулфикуор житель  района Спитамен. Он женат и имеет четверых детей. Его жена занимается шитьем женской одежды дома. Зулфикуор работал в школе преподавателем. Зулфикуор арендует 0,20 Га земельный участок и занимается земледелием. Он каждый сезон сажает пшеницу. Ему в работе помогают дети. Зулфикуор 20 лет своей жизни был занят этими деятельностями. Он трудолюбивый человек. Зулфикуор много трудиться, чтобы обеспечить семью. Сейчас Зулфикуор хочет начать новый бизнес животноводство. У него имеется коровник и корм для скота, но у него нет скотов. По этой причине он берет кредит для купли крупнорогатого скота. Ваш кредит поможет ему начать бизнес и зарабатывать больше для жизни семьи. Только Вы можете поддержать его.  Зулфикуор верит Вас и   очень надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Zulfikuor lives in the Spitamen district of Tajikistan.  He is married and the father of four children.  His wife sews women's clothes from home.  Zulfikuor used to work as a school teacher.  He also leases 0.2 hectare of land and is involved in crop farming, sowing wheat at the beginning of every season.  He has already devoted 20 years of his life to this activity.  Zulfikuor is hardworking and works tirelessly in order to provide for his family.  At the moment, he wants to start a new business and get involved in animal husbandry.  He already has a barn and some feed for his livestock, but he doesn't have any farm animals yet.  For this reason, he is taking a loan to buy some cattle.  Thanks to your support, Zulfikuor will be able to start a new business and increase his income to support his family.  Please help Zulfikuor.  He is solely relying on you.

loans.use: to start a new business and to buy cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase doors and windows for her new house to make it ready for living.

loans.name: Rorya Grp Musoma Group

texts.en:
Juma, early 40s, is married with nine children (four boys and five daughters), all of whom are still in school.  He has been running a retail shop for six years now.  He works from 8am to 8pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Juma's 3rd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loans to increase his shop stock. Previously, the shop was very small with few items but since he received his two loans, his shop has increased and he can now serve more customers as he is able to meet his customers' demands.  

He is happy with the loans and appreciates Kiva for their support.  He used the past profit to pay school fees and cover household expenses.  He will use this loan to restock his shop inventory.  He dreams of building his own house.

Juma will share his loan with his loan group "RORYA GRP MUSOMA" which consist of seven members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock shop inventory.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more clothes for her own clothing sale business.

loans.name: Erly

texts.en:
Erly is 35 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Erly is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Erly has been in this business for 10 years and she also earns additional income from buying and selling vegetables.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Grupo Ada Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “GRUPO ADA” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Santiago II, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rosmery es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de chompas, venta de medias, venta de dulces, venta de CD’s, venta de condimentos, venta de cosméticos, servicio de curandería.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rosmery es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta chompas; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió hace varios años por impulso de su madre, quien tenía el mismo negocio, posteriormente ella decide emprender un negocio independiente. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de chompas por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la frontera Perú - Bolivia y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud y la capacitación que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “GRUPO ADA” communal bank is starting its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Santiago II regional office. The group has nine members and is run by a management board, whose president is señora Rosmery. The businesses that the group members run are varied, including: sales of sweaters, sales of socks and stockings, sales of sweets, sales of CDs, sales of condiments, sales of cosmetics and herbal medicine services. 

The loan they wish to take out will benefit small microenterprises, one of which is run by señora Rosmery. She tells us that it is the first time she has been involved in Pro Mujer and that she joined at the invitation of a friend who is a client of the institution. At present, she runs a business selling sweaters. She started the business several years ago with the help of her mother who ran a similar business. Señora Rosmery later decided to start her own independent business.  

The loan she wishes to take out is to increase her resources (purchase of sweaters from wholesalers). She will buy from the women who sell wholesale on the Peru-Bolivia border and she will subsequently sell the stock on her stand. This way of working gives her the means to financially support her family, as she is single and has one child.   

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the health centre and the training that the instiution offers.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale

loans.name: Alvaro

texts.es: Alvaro, tiene la edad  de 37 años, está casado, vive con sus hijos y  esposa  que es su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de unos terneros para el engorde y que tengan buenas características en el rápido desarrollo y ganancia de peso. La idea es aprovechar el espacio que tiene de pasto y las buenas condiciones de terreno y clima para poder tener estos animales y desarrollar terneros para en el futuro venderlos para carne. Con esta compra podrá desarrollar una actividad más, y a la vez tener un ahorro que le permitirá ir teniendo más animales e invertir más en la propiedad.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Alvaro is 37 years old, married and lives with his wife and his children, who are his main priority in life. 

With his loan he wishes to buy some calves for fattening and would like them to have suitable characteristics for fast raising and weight gain. His idea is to take advantage of the pasture space that he has and good land and weather conditions to have these animals and raise calves to sell them for meat in the future.  

This purchase will enable him to start another business and at the same time allow him to set money aside so that he can continue buying animals and investing more in his property. It is his first loan from FUDESUCOR. He has not had any other previous loans with the state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy calves for fattening

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.es:
Rosalina de 38 años de edad, ella  cuenta con un nivel académico de bachillerato secretarial, y desempeña la actividad sastrería en el lugar donde vive como también la actividad de oficios domésticos  y vive junto a sus dos hijos de 15 y 16   años de edad, los dos se encuentra estudiando en nivel básico, ella también realiza el comercio de productos para uso de limpieza y cocina del hogar. 

Rosalina conoce muy bien las actividad que desempeña ya que la ejerce desde hace varios años lo que le ha permitió dar a sus hijos su nivel académico, ella realiza la actividad de sastrería desde hace muchos años cuando tenía a sus dos  hijos pequeños y observo que su esposo necesitaba apoyo, fue así como ella se comenzó a conocer el negocio y hasta la fecha es una actividad que realiza periódicamente, además sus hijos han aprendido la costura y le colaboran a ella siempre que pueden.  
  
Este crédito lo necesita para comprar telas para la fabricación de delantales, toallas, trapeadores etc. que son artículos de uso para limpieza de hogar.   

Rosalina  tiene como visión que su familia tenga buena salud,  mejorar su vivienda para mayor seguridad y que también sus hijos concluyan con una carrera académica para que puedan tener oportunidad en un futuro.
texts.en:
Rosalina is 38 years old and went to secretarial school. She works as a seamstress in the town where she lives. She also looks after the household chores, and lives with her 16- and 15-year-old children, both of whom are in school. Rosalina also works selling products for cleaning the household and kitchen.

Rosalina is very good at her work as she has been doing it for a number of years; it has allowed her to put her children through school. Rosalina has been a seamstress for many years. She started it when she had children and realised that her husband needed support with the bills. Rosalina started to learn about the business and still does this work. Rosalina’s children have also learned the trade and always help her when they can.

Rosalina needs this loan in order to buy material to produce aprons, towels, mops and other items used to clean the home.

Rosalina wants her family to have good health, and to improve her home so that it is more secure. She wants her children to learn a profession so that they many have opportunities in the future.

loans.use: to buy material to produce aprons, towels, mops and other items used to clean the home.

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es:
María de 56 años de edad, no posee ningún tipo de nivel académico, actualmente está acompañada y tiene dos hijos, de los cuales ninguno vive con ellos, porque ya están casados y su esposo no trabaja mucho ya que se encuentra muy mal de salud.

Ella trabaja desde hace diez años en la agricultura, está actividad la aprendió junto con su esposo quien es agricultor, pero no trabaja de lleno debido a su enfermedad, desde entonces el ella se esfuerza más pero uno de sus hijos le ayuda a trabajar las dos hectáreas de terreno.

El dinero de este crédito será invertido para pagar el alquiler de dos hectáreas que cultivará y comprar insumos agrícolas.

Ella sueña con que su pareja pueda recuperarse por completo de su enfermedad y espera seguir trabajando para lograrlo.
texts.en:
Maria, 56, has no education and her husband does not work because he is in very bad health.  Her two children are married and independent.

She has worked for ten years in agriculture which she learned about from her husband who is a farmer.  He is unable to work fulltime because of his illness so she is the one who works harder.  One of her children helps out on the two hectares of land she farms.

The money from the loan will be used to pay rent on the two hectares of land she uses to grow crops and to buy farm supplies.

Her dream is that her husband makes a full recovery from his illness.  She hopes to be able to continue working until that happens.

loans.use: To pay rental on two hectares of cropland and to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Merlin Hemelsi

texts.es:
Merlin es una joven de 23 años de edad, estudio bachillerato y esta soltera, ella vive con sus padres y son los únicos que dependen económicamente de ella.


Merlin se dedica a la preparación de pescados en una atunera desde hace 2 años, aprendió este negocio después que hubo recorte de personal en  una farmacia en la cual ella era empleada, el lugar donde ahora trabaja esta a 5km de su casa y viaja en autobús.


El crédito lo utilizara  para pagar los servicios de una maquina  moledora de sacate para alimentar 2 vacas.

Sus planes son ampliar el negocio y sueña con comprar 2 vacas mas.
texts.en:
Merlin is 23 years old and completed high school. She is single and lives with her parents, the only people who depend on her financially.

Merlin has been making a living preparing fish at a tuna factory for two years. She learned this work when there were redundancies at the pharmacy where she previously worked. Merlin’s work is five kilometres from her home. She travels there by bus.

Merlin will use this loan to pay to have grass milled to feed two cows.

Merlin’s plans for the future are to expand her business. She dreams of buying two more cows.

loans.use: to pay to have grass milled to feed two cows.

loans.name: Rosa Melida

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 32 años de edad, goza de buena reputación en la comunidad, vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hija quien tiene 4 años de edad. 

Rosa tiene 15 años de trabajar como empleada en una planta procesadora de camarón, en la misma comunidad donde vive, es de aquí donde obtiene sus ingresos para el sustento de la familia.

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar una motocicleta para poder trasladarse a su trabajo, ya que su esposo hace un gran sacrificio para ir a dejarla pues tiene que dejar a su hija sola y ella no se siente tranquila.

Rosa está muy agradecida con el apoyo y la confianza  que CREDICAMPO le ha dado, y es así como ella puede lograr sus metas, su deseo es ayudar a su hija en el estudio para que sea una persona de bien para el desarrollo de la sociedad.
texts.en:
Rosa is 32 years old and has a good reputation in the community. Rosa lives with her partner and four-year-old daughter.

For 15 years, Rosa has worked at a shrimp-processing factory in her local community. She earns a living at this job in order to support her family.

Rosa needs a loan in order to buy a motorcycle for travelling to work. Currently her husband has to take her to work but this means that the couple must leave their daughter alone, which she does not like.

Rosa is very grateful for the support and trust given to her by CrediCampo. With it, she is able to achieve her goals. Rosa’s wish is to help her daughter to study so that she can do good things for society.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for travelling to work.

loans.name: Nelsa Miriam

texts.es:
La Sra. Mirian es una mujer luchadora que día a día se esfuerza  para salir adelante junto a sus hijos tiene  41 años, ella es madre soltera tiene dos hijos el mayor de 19 años y el menor de 17 años ella viene de familia de bajos recursos económicos y no pudo estudiar, vive en un pequeño Recinto llamado Amanecer Campesino un lugar tranquilo de clima cálido húmedo rodeado de gente amable y trabajadora 
Ella se dedica a la producción de pollos este negocio la aprendió desde niña ya que en el campo la gran mayoría de personas se dedican a esta actividad, al mismo le dedica un promedio de 6 horas diarias  
En el negocio de los pollos no hay muchas actividades difíciles pero sin embargo lo más complicado es el cuidado de los pollos cuando son bebes  por las diferentes enfermedades que existen y que tienen que combatir para criarlos, trabaja un promedio de 8 horas diarias entre su negocio y los trabajos que realiza fuera de casa 
Ella como muchos tiene varios sueños que quisiera realizar uno de ellos es ponerse una pequeña tienda en su casa para aprovechar la ventaja que es tener su casa frente al estadio del recinto, que todos los fines de semana hay mucha gente que acude hacer deporte en el mismo 
Mirian agradece a Fundación Alternativa  y a Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidades brindada para ella y su familia ya que podrán incrementar su ingreso económico
texts.en:
Mirian, 41, is a determined woman who works hard every day to get ahead with her children.  She is a single mother with two children, ages 19 and 17.  Having come from a humble background she was unable to get an education.  She lives in a small community called Amacener Campesino which is a quiet place with a warm, humid climate and kind, hard-working people.

She raises chickens which she learned about as a little girl because most people in the rural area are involved in this activity.  Her work schedule is an average six hours a day.

In the chicken business there are not many difficult tasks but it becomes more complicated when caring for chicks because of the variety of illnesses that can set in.  Mirian works an average eight hours a day between her business activity and the housework.

Like many people, she has several goals, one of which is to open a small store at home to take advantage of the fact that her house is across from the community stadium.  Every weekend there are many people who visit the stadium for sporting events.

Mirian is grateful to Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the support it gives to her and her family so they can increase their income.

loans.use: To strengthen her business, although she wants to open a small store.

loans.name: Dúo Trabajadoras Con Éxito Group

texts.es:
DUO TRABAJADORAS CON EXITO
La señora Marta de 31 años de edad ella vive en patzicia y se dedica a elaborar cajas de madera para empaque de verduras  como lechuga  y otros, además de atender a su familia ella busca otra actividad a que dedicarse ya qué  tiene sus hijos y están estudiando  y no alcanza solo con lo que el esposo gana por esa razón es que ella se dedica a otras actividades. Para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos y darles lo necesario, ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de madera para la elaboracion de cajas para verduras.
texts.en:
Marta, 31, lives in Patzicia and makes wooden crates for vegetables such as lettuce and others.  In addition to caring for her family she also looks for other activities to do since her children attend school and her husband does not earn enough on his own to cover expenses.

In order to give her children what they need she is requesting a loan to buy wood to make crates for vegetables.

loans.use: To buy wood to make crates for vegetables.

loans.name: Petronila

texts.es:
Petronila tiene 38 años de edad, ella no cuenta con ningún nivel académico, vive junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 14, 16 y 18  años de edad los cuales se encuentra estudiando en nivel básico.

Petronila se dedica a la venta de tortillas, actividad que viene realizando desde hace muchos años y lo cual le ha servido para darles estudios a sus hijos, además decidió dedicarse a esto al ver que su esposo necesitaba apoyo para los gastos del hogar, sus hijos le apoyan a su negocio de modo que trabajan en conjunto para salir adelante.
  
Ella necesita este crédito para comprar maíz para la producción de tortillas.  

Sus sueños son seguir trabajando para lograr que sus hijos sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Petronila, 38, does not have an formal education.  She lives with her husband and three children, ages 14, 16 and 18 who attend school.  

Petronila sells tortillas and has been in business for many years.  She decided to start this activity to help her husband with the household expenses, and it has allowed her to give her children an education.  Her children help her in the business so they work together to get ahead.

She is in need of a loan to buy corn to make tortillas.

Her goal is to continue working so her children can become professionals.

loans.use: To buy corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel, de 43 años de edad, no tiene ningún tipo de nivel académico, actualmente está acompañado y tiene un hijo, el cual está estudiando primer año de bachillerato.

Manuel, trabaja como agricultor desde hace más de 32 años, prácticamente desde que era un niño, actualmente siembra tres hectáreas de maíz y frijol y la actividad la aprendió de su padre quien era agricultor.

Él necesita el crédito para comprar tres vacas lecheras para criarlas y luego venderlas y así comprar insumos agrícolas para sembrar.

El principal propósito de Manuel es que su hijo se gradúe de bachillerato y sabe que si sigue trabajando tan fuerte como lo está haciendo lo podrá lograr.
texts.en:
Manuel, 43, does not have a formal education.  He and his partner have a son who is in his first year of high school.

Manuel has been working as a farmer for 32 years, practically since he was a child.  He currently cultivates three hectares of corn and beans and learned the farming trade from his father.

He is in need of a loan to buy three dairy cows to raise and sell, and to buy farm supplies for his crops.

Manuel's goal is to see his son graduate from high school.  He knows that if he continues to work as hard as he does now, he will achieve his goal.

loans.use: To buy three dairy cowns to raise and sell, and farm supplies for his crops.

loans.name: Dina Nohemy

texts.es:
Dina, de 26 años de edad, es una persona muy humilde y trabajadora, estudió hasta octavo grado, no pudo continuar  por que sus padres no le continuaron apoyando, está casada y tiene dos hijos, por los cuales lucha día a día.

Dina, tiene tres años trabajando en la agricultura junto a su esposo, siembra hortalizas como chile y tomate, hoy en día ya tiene los conocimientos y la experiencia necesaria para cultivar estas verduras.

Está solicitando el crédito para cultivar 7,000 metros cuadrados de pepino y de chile, ya que hay mucha demanda de los clientes de estos productos y necesita poder pagar mano de obra para poder cultivar.

Dina, sueña con construir un macro túnel, para poder trabajar con el cultivo de tomate, ya que también hay mucha demanda y espera que este cultivo sea más rentable.
texts.en:
Dina is 26 years old. She is a very humble and hardworking person. She went to school up to the eighth grade. She wasn't able to continue because her parents didn't continue supporting her. She is married and has two children, for whom she fights day to day. 

Dina has been working as a farmer with her husband for 3 years. She grows vegetables like chiles and tomatoes. Today she has  the necessary knowledge and experience to grow these vegetables. 

She is asking for the loan to plant 7,000 square meters of cucumbers and chiles, because there is a lot of demand from customers for these products and she needs to pay for the labor for planting. 

Dina's dream is to build a macro tunnel so she can grow tomatoes. There is also a lot of demand for them and she hopes this crop will be more profitable.

loans.use: to plant 7,000 square meters of cucumbers and chiles.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build four walls on a plot of land he bought for the advancement of his family.

loans.name: Dúo Las Flores De Villa Nueva Group

texts.es:
Dúo las flores de Villa Nueva
Doña Zuli  Nohemí de 20 años de edad, ella empezó su negocio con la cantidad de quinientos quetzales 
Para poder compra un poco de ropa clasificada con una vecina de su comunidad 
Y luego decido poner mejor un local pequeño el cual sigue trabajando  para lograr tener 
Un mejor negocio, agradece a Dios a sus padres por el apoyo que le ha dado para poder tener lo que hasta ahora he logrado, su mayor anhelo es poder  ver a su hijo graduado para que en un futuro le vaya bien gracia por comprenderme y darme la oportunidad de un crédito que me va a servir para tener un mejor negocio.ya que comprara un lote de ropa de segunda mano para vender.
texts.en:
Las Flores de Villa Nueva Duo

Doña Zuli Nohemí is 20 years old. She started her business with the amount of five hundred quetzales to buy a little classified (used) clothing with a neighbor from her community. Later she decided to open a small locale where she keeps working in order to have a better business. She thanks God and her parents for the support they have given her to have what she has achieved so far. Her greatest wish is to see her son graduate so that in the future it will go well for him. "Thank you for understanding me and give me the opportunity of a loan which will help me have a better business because I will buy a lot of second hand clothing to sell."

loans.use: to buy second hand clothing to sell.

loans.name: Ana Daysi

texts.es:
Ana de 64 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado,  esta soltera y tiene tres hijos que son mayores de edad y tienen sus propios hogares, con ella solo viven 3 nietos  que también trabajan.

Ana se ha dedicado desde haces 20 años a la venta de rellenos de punche, el trabajo lo aprendió con  su madre que también se dedicaba a la mismo, el trabajo lo realiza en su casa y debe ir hasta la playa a buscar el producto, sus nietos son quienes se involucran y le ayudan a Ana.


Este préstamo lo solicita para comprar punches, condimentos y verduras para continuar con su venta.

Ella sueña con lograr construir un local donde sus clientes puedan sentirse cómodos y a la vez puedan consumir a gusto lo que ella cocina.
texts.en:
Ana, 64, went to school until the sixth form. She is single and has three children, all adults who live separately. Only three grandchildren live with her, and they also work.
She has been selling stuffed crabs for twenty years, a trade she learned from her mother. She prepares the food at home and has to go to the beach to look for crabs. Her grandchildren help her.
She asks for this loan to buy crabs, herbs, spices, and vegetables to keep preparing food to sell.
Her dream is to build a locale where her customers can come to eat comfortably.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare food to sell.

loans.name: Ana Ester

texts.es:
Ana, de 21 años de edad, solo pudo estudiar hasta octavo grado de educación básica, ya que sus padres no tenían la condición económica para seguir apoyándole en sus estudios, está casada y su esposo trabaja como cobrador en una comercial.

Ana, tiene tres años de trabajar como cocinera en un restaurante, todas las mañanas se levanta muy temprano para ir al trabajo, ya que su lugar de trabajo, está a un kilómetro de distancia aproximadamente desde su casa. 

Ana, solicita este crédito para comprar ladrillos, cemento, hierro entre otros materiales de construcción para hacer su casa de ladrillo.

Ella sueña con tener una vivienda digna, en donde pueda estar de manera segura con su familia y sabe que con la ayuda de Dios y su esfuerzo lo podrá lograr.
texts.en:
Ana is 21 and could not go further than the eighth form, due to her parents' dire financial situation. She is married and her husband works as a collection agent for a company.
Ana has been a cook, employed at a restaurant, for three years. She wakes up very early every morning to go to work, since she has to walk one kilometre to get there. 
Ana asks for a loan to buy bricks, cement, iron, and other construction supplies to build a brick house.
She dreams of a decent house where she and her family can feel safe. She knows that with God's help and her own efforts she will be able to make this dream come true.

loans.use: to buy construction supplies to build a brick house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to start her own restaurant.

loans.name: Blanca Elizabeth

texts.es:
Blanca de 20 años de edad, estudio unicamente hasta el sexto grado, ella esta acompañada y tiene un hijo de un año de edad, su pareja  se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de cerdos y ganado.


Blanca se dedica a la crianza de cerdos para destazar y venderlos, se dedica a este rubro desde que se caso con su esposo, ademas le ayuda a su madre en la venta de tamales, posee una vaca la cual ordeña y elabora productos derivados de la leche.


El crédito solicitado lo necesita para comprar dos vacas, de esta forma se le estará ayudando a Blanca a aumentar a producción de leche y elaborar sus derivados.

Su sueño es tener mucho ganado, darle lo mejor a su hijo y algún día ser lo que ella siempre ha querido, una maestra.
texts.en:
Blanca is 20 years old. She only went to school up to the sixth grade. She is married and has a one year old son. Her husband works in agriculture and raising pigs and cattle.  

Blanca raises bigs to butcher and sell. She has done this since she married her husband. She also helps her mother sell tamales. She has a cow she milks and she makes dairy products.  

She needs the loan she has asked for to buy two cows. This way, Blanca will have help to increase milk production and make dairy products. Her dream is to have a lot of cattle, give her son the best, and one day become what she has always wanted to be, a teacher.

loans.use: to buy two cows, which will help Blanca to increase milk production and make dairy products.

loans.name: Maria Gregoria

texts.es: María es una señora de 44 años, vive en unión libre con el señor Jesús, vive junto a él,  ya hace varios años el amor que un día los unió, hoy conforman una hermosa familia con 2 hijos, el mayor que ya tiene familia, y el menor que tiene 13 años y cursa sus estudios secundarios, su esposo Don Jesús se dedica a realizar fletes  transporta personas, mercaderías, entre otros; labora para el dueño del vehículo ya que su condición económica no le ha permitido adquirir su propio medio de trabajo, María se dedica a la venta de cosméticos ocasionalmente, pero desde hace un tiempo su fuerte es preparar asados para la venta, actividad que la realiza en su hogar en un pequeño horno que adquirió con sus ahorros para emprender su pequeño negocio, ella y su familia viven hace 6 años en el Barrio la Castellana, ubicado en Santo Domingo, este sector es muy transitado por esto su negocio ha crecido en este corto tiempo, el crédito al que aplica María lo invertirá en la compra de un refrigerador y arreglar el piso de su negocio, para ofrecer una mejor atención a sus clientes, conoció de la Fundación ya que hace varios años accedió a un crédito de un monto similar para realizar otro proyecto, desde hace tiempo ella quiso echar a andar esta idea pero por falta de capital no lo pudo realizar, y debido a que su esposo enfermó y no tenían ingresos, pasaron un tiempo con varias necesidades pero ella hacia trabajos ocasionales y pudo apoyar a su familia en esta etapa difícil, hoy en día María Agradece a Fundación alternativa y al Proyecto Kiva por facilitar que su gran sueño de superación se haga realidad.
texts.en:
María, 44, lives in a common-law marriage with Jesús. They live together, as love united them several years ago. Now they have a beautiful family with two children. The oldest already has his own family, and the youngest, who is 13, is in secondary education. Her spouse, Don Jesús, works as a freight driver to transport people and merchandise among other things. He works for the owner of the vehicle as his economic condition has not allowed him to acquire his own means of work.

María works selling cosmetics occasionally, but for a while now her forte has been preparing roast meats to sell. She does this in her home in a small oven that she acquired with her savings that she used to set up her small business. For six years now she and her family have lived in Barrio la Castellana, located in Santo Domingo. This area is well traversed and this is why her business has grown in this short time.

The loan María is asking for will be used to buy a refrigerator and to repair the floor of her business, in order to offer a better service to her customers. She knew about the Foundation as she took out a similar loan several years ago in order to carry out another project. For some time she has wanted to get this project going, but she was not able to due to a lack of capital, and due to her husband falling ill, they had no income. They spent some time with various necessities but María did occasional work and was able to support her family during this difficult period. Today, María is grateful to the Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for helping her big dream of improvement to come true.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and repair her floor.

loans.name: Dúo Luz En Mi Camino Group

texts.es: Dúo Luz en Mi Camino La encargada de este grupo es la señora Estefana quien tiene más de 25 años de tener su negocio en la calle principal de su colonia.  Cuenta con el apoyo incondicional de su esposo y el trabajo en equipo de sus dos hijas ya mayores de edad.  Nos cuenta que desea comprar varios quintales de maíz valorados Q 150.00 cada uno y no tiene el dinero suficiente para hacer su pedido de maíz.  Debe comprar porque la venta de tortillas está muy bien y tiene varias entregas que hacer en algunas fábricas.  Por eso necesita el préstamo para seguir adelante con el negocio y aprovechar la compra de los bajos precios de quintales de maíz durante estos meses.
texts.en:
